name: Can You Escape The House 4
description:
Welcome to Can You Escape The House 4 - a cool escape game!

Do you think you have the skills with Can You Escape The House 4 - a cool escape game?


Can You Escape The House 4 is another point and click escape game. Assume that you are in a house which is locked. Your sole aim now is to escape from the house by finding the key. Can you escape from the house on your own? Find the key by interacting with objects and solving puzzles. Have fun!


Can You Escape The House 4 is an exciting new point and click house escape game for an overall daily dose of fun escape and adventure! A sequel of the previous game Can You Escape The House 3! As a real estate agent, it is your job to check out the house you are going to sell if it’s fit and worth the price for the buyers. Today, you were given another luxurious house to sell and knowing what it really looks and works like is very vital. As you roam around the house, you saw that it is definitely worthy to be called luxurious. But at some point inside, you found that the doors and other exits would not open! What!? Is this some sort of prank!? Well, the only thing to do at this point, is to escape out of here and while you’re at it, try not to destroy things or we can’t sell this no more! Good luck.
